originContent: # Overview
translatedContent: # Visi√≥n general

originContent: Koffi is a fast and easy-to-use C FFI module for Node.js, featuring:
translatedContent: Koffi es un m√≥dulo FFI en C r√°pido y f√°cil de usar para Node.js, con las siguientes caracter√≠sticas:

originContent: * Low-overhead and fast performance (see [benchmarks](https://koffi.dev/benchmarks))
translatedContent: * Bajo overhead y alto rendimiento (ver [benchmarks](https://koffi.dev/benchmarks))

originContent: * Support for primitive and aggregate data types (structs and fixed-size arrays), both by reference (pointer) and by value
translatedContent: * Soporte para tipos de datos primitivos y agregados (estructuras y arrays de tama√±o fijo), tanto por referencia (puntero) como por valor

originContent: * Javascript functions can be used as C callbacks (since 1.2.0)
translatedContent: * Funciones de Javascript pueden usarse como callbacks en C (desde la versi√≥n 1.2.0)

originContent: * Well-tested code base for popular OS/architecture combinations
translatedContent: * Base de c√≥digo bien probada para combinaciones populares de SO/arquitectura

originContent: The following combinations of OS and architectures __are officially supported and tested__ at the moment:
translatedContent: Las siguientes combinaciones de SO y arquitecturas __est√°n oficialmente soportadas y probadas__ actualmente:

originContent: ISA / OS           | Windows     | Linux    | macOS       | FreeBSD     | OpenBSD
translatedContent: ISA / SO           | Windows     | Linux    | macOS       | FreeBSD     | OpenBSD

originContent: x86 (IA32) [^1]    | ‚úÖ Yes      | ‚úÖ Yes   | ‚¨úÔ∏è *N/A*    | ‚úÖ Yes      | ‚úÖ Yes
x86_64 (AMD64)     | ‚úÖ Yes      | ‚úÖ Yes   | ‚úÖ Yes      | ‚úÖ Yes      | ‚úÖ Yes
ARM32 LE [^2]      | ‚¨úÔ∏è *N/A*    | ‚úÖ Yes   | ‚¨úÔ∏è *N/A*    | üü® Probably | üü® Probably
translatedContent: ARM32 LE [^2]      | ‚¨úÔ∏è *N/A*    | ‚úÖ S√≠    | ‚¨úÔ∏è *N/A*    | üü® Probable | üü® Probable

originContent: ARM64 (AArch64) LE | ‚úÖ Yes      | ‚úÖ Yes   | ‚úÖ Yes      | ‚úÖ Yes      | üü® Probably
translatedContent: ARM64 (AArch64) LE | ‚úÖ S√≠       | ‚úÖ S√≠    | ‚úÖ S√≠       | ‚úÖ S√≠       | üü® Probable

originContent: RISC-V 64 [^3]     | ‚¨úÔ∏è *N/A*    | ‚úÖ Yes   | ‚¨úÔ∏è *N/A*    | üü® Probably | üü® Probably
translatedContent: RISC-V 64 [^3]     | ‚¨úÔ∏è *N/A*    | ‚úÖ S√≠    | ‚¨úÔ∏è *N/A*    | üü® Probable | üü® Probable

originContent: [^1]: The following call conventions are supported: cdecl, stdcall, MS fastcall, thiscall.
translatedContent: [^1]: Se soportan las siguientes convenciones de llamada: cdecl, stdcall, MS fastcall, thiscall.

originContent: [^2]: The prebuilt binary uses the hard float ABI and expects a VFP coprocessor. Build from source to use Koffi with a different ABI (softfp, soft).
translatedContent: [^2]: El binario precompilado usa la ABI hard float y espera un coprocesador VFP. Compila desde el c√≥digo fuente para usar Koffi con una ABI diferente (softfp, soft).

originContent: [^3]: The prebuilt binary uses the LP64D (double-precision float) ABI. The LP64 ABI is supported in theory if you build Koffi from source but this is untested. The LP64F ABI is not supported.
translatedContent: [^3]: El binario precompilado usa la ABI LP64D (float de doble precisi√≥n). La ABI LP64 est√° soportada te√≥ricamente si compilas Koffi desde el c√≥digo fuente pero no ha sido probada. La ABI LP64F no est√° soportada.

originContent: Use the following links for more information:
translatedContent: Usa los siguientes enlaces para m√°s informaci√≥n:

originContent: - Documentation: https://koffi.dev/
translatedContent: - Documentaci√≥n: https://koffi.dev/

translatedContent: - Registro de cambios: https://koffi.dev/changelog

translatedContent: - C√≥digo fuente: https://codeberg.org/Koromix/rygel/ (ver explicaci√≥n abajo)

originContent: # Source code
translatedContent: # C√≥digo fuente

originContent: This repository does not contain the code of Koffi but only exists as a front. For pratical reasons, I've started using a single repository for all my projects in 2018 because it is easier to manage.
translatedContent: Este repositorio no contiene el c√≥digo de Koffi sino que solo existe como interfaz. Por razones pr√°cticas, comenc√© a usar un √∫nico repositorio para todos mis proyectos en 2018 porque es m√°s f√°cil de gestionar.

originContent: The source code is available here: https://codeberg.org/Koromix/rygel/ (in the *src/koffi* subdirectory).
translatedContent: El c√≥digo fuente est√° disponible aqu√≠: https://codeberg.org/Koromix/rygel/ (en el subdirectorio *src/koffi*).

originContent: Monorepositories have two killer features for me:
translatedContent: Los monorrepositorios tienen dos caracter√≠sticas clave para m√≠:

originContent: * Cross-project refactoring
translatedContent: * Refactorizaci√≥n entre proyectos

originContent: * Simplified dependency management
translatedContent: * Gesti√≥n de dependencias simplificada

originContent: You can find a more detailed rationale here: https://danluu.com/monorepo/
translatedContent: Puedes encontrar una justificaci√≥n m√°s detallada aqu√≠: https://danluu.com/monorepo/

originContent: # Build manually
translatedContent: # Compilar manualmente

originContent: Koffi is built with a custom CMake-wrapper called CNoke, which also lives in the monorepository. Don't try to run CMake manually because it will fail.
translatedContent: Koffi se construye con un envoltorio personalizado de CMake llamado CNoke, que tambi√©n est√° en el monorrepositorio. No intentes ejecutar CMake manualmente porque fallar√°.

originContent: Follow the [documented build instructions](https://koffi.dev/contribute#build-from-source) to build Koffi from source.
translatedContent: Sigue las [instrucciones de compilaci√≥n documentadas](https://koffi.dev/contribute#build-from-source) para compilar Koffi desde el c√≥digo fuente.
